header.name: Eternal Lair of Uadjit
header.author: Watabou Generator
header.description: Uadjit is long dead, but people are still afraid to come close to the lair. Now it is controlled by a band of gnolls. Word is that a legendary rod Arhogath is hidden here.

rooms.name: room_1
rooms.description: A half-eaten body of a gnoll, a bat-shaped key close to it.

rooms.name: room_2
rooms.description: A notable stone double door with a keyhole to the north.

rooms.name: room_3
rooms.description: A noble, sleeping in a corner.

rooms.name: room_4
rooms.description: A wand of illusions locked in a magical safe.

rooms.name: room_5
rooms.description: A statue of a rhino, bursts into flames when touched.
